highlight.title: Breaking Bad: S3 E6
highlight.time: Sun Dec 17 1995 00:43:00 GMT-0200 (Horário de Verão de Brasília)
highlight.desc: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

about.summery: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.
about.creator: Vince Gilligan
